column5: Thinking of making an impulse buy here. The 4x HDI Ice is listed at 308.95 at LeBaron, less 10% for members, plus a $50 rebate. Hard to beat that price.  For those of you that own one of these units, can you tell me if it would be possible to adapt this unit to a kayak for soft water? Is this unit effective for soft water or ice only?  Thanks, don't want to splurge and then regret not being able to use it this summer....
Guess it's a moot point, seems like they're sold out everywhere........
